extraSections.text:
# Cattyverse Paddock Club Play To Earn Game!

Paddock Club members integrate various reward systems and mining system into the project in order to earn real-life income with various Web3-based game modes, and bring the community together with events that will take place every week, where users can enjoy playing and earn at the same time, and create a social environment in various game modes from live music. It aims to strengthen the bond between members in the environment. You will be able to earn the coins in the game which is able to be bought items such as houses, cars, pets, etc. Character customization objects designed to be used in the game that you can use in the market, or you can use them to buy Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs. By the rank system in the game, you will be able to obtain the specific title by earning the coins and be one of the most exclusive members of the Paddock Club.

# The Low Down

### PLAY TO EARN!

People, who have the Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs, will catch the earning NEAR coin opportunity in the Web3 game.

 ### $5,000 GIVEAWAY

1 person who owns at least 10 of the Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs will receive a $5000 prize in the biggest giveaway.

### CATTYVERSE STYLE

 You will be able to add Cattyverse air to your style with a variety of clothing, hats and accessories.

 ### PADDOCK CLUB SPECIAL

 * The opportunity to earn all the coins which added to the pool system by participating to the multiplayer competition.
 * The opportunity to access to the events which we will organise the live music with the contracted artists and DJs in the Paddock Club.
 * The opportunity to earn prestige rewards exclusive to Paddock Club such as NFT, Coin, Tittle, and etc.

# FAQ

 * Supply 1,111 NFTS (Gen 1)
 * Whitelist Price: 4 NEAR
 * Mint Price: 6 NEAR
 * WL Mint: June 09  16:00 UTC (VIP Sale Length 22 Hours)
 * Public Mint: June 10
 * Royality: %7

Note: At MOST 5x NFTs will be available to mint per user.
